      Campus
      In Photos | Move-in Weekend 2019
      September 29, 2019 by Daily Nexus Photography

      Last weekend saw hordes of UC Santa Barbara freshmen flood the campus and move into their dorms, reviving the campus as the first week of school began. Nexus photographers captured photos of the move-in madness; check them out below:
